subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Mark Cavendish of Britain won the fifth and longest stage of the Tour de France, a flat, 144-mile run. Stefan Schumacher of Germany retained the overall lead.
snippet: Mark Cavendish of Britain won the fifth and longest stage of the Tour de France, a flat, 144-mile run. Stefan Schumacher of Germany retained the overall lead.
